sub_topic: Finding the minimum spanning tree of a graph.
message_1:
Consider the weighted undirected graph shown below:

```
           4     b
        /     \
    2 /         \ 6
    /             \
  a --- 3 --- c --- d
    \             /
     7 \         / 5
        \     /
           8
```

Determine the minimum spanning tree (MST) of the graph starting from node 'a' using the Prim's algorithm.
